channel.title: x86-64 on brimstone's blog
channel.description: Recent content in x86-64 on brimstone's blog

item.title: Shellcode Research
item.description: Hello, world! global _start section .text _start: mov rax, 1 ; write( mov rdi, 1 ; STDOUT_FILENO, mov rsi, msg ; "Hello, world!\n", mov rdx, msglen ; sizeof("Hello, world!\n") syscall ; ); mov rax, 60 ; exit( mov rdi, 0 ; EXIT_SUCCESS syscall ; ); section .rodata msg: db "Hello, world!", 10 msglen: equ $ - msg $ nasm -f elf64 -o hello.o hello.asm $ ld -o hello hello.o $ .
